trans-unit.source: A package pattern must be provided.
At least one source must be selected.
trans-unit.target: Необходимо выбрать по крайней мере один источник.

trans-unit.source: A hostname must be provided after '://'.
No project is selected for this operation.
trans-unit.target: Для этой операции не выбран проект.

trans-unit.source: No projects supported by NuGet in the solution.
trans-unit.target: В решении нет проектов, поддерживаемыхх NuGet.

trans-unit.source: Search Online for NuGet Packages matching '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Поиск в Интернете пакетов NuGet, соответствующих «{0}»

trans-unit.source: Allow NuGet to download missing packages

Project is not eligible for migration. Either the project is not packages.config based or doesn't support PackageReference yet. Visit https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/reference/migrate-packages-config-to-package-reference for more information.
trans-unit.target: Проект не подходит для миграции. Он либо не основан на packages.config, либо еще не поддерживает PackageReference. Дополнительные сведения: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/reference/migrate-packages-config-to-package-reference.

trans-unit.source: Project is not eligible for migration. Either the project is not packages.config based or doesn't support PackageReference yet.
trans-unit.target: Проект не подходит для миграции. Он либо не основан на packages.config, либо еще не поддерживает PackageReference.

trans-unit.source: These settings are stored in %NuGet.Config% files
trans-unit.note: Do not translate % % or what is between them

trans-unit.source: Solution is not saved. Please save your solution before managing NuGet packages.
trans-unit.target: Решение не сохранено. Сохраните свое решение, прежде чем управлять пакетами NuGet.

trans-unit.source: Audit sources provide vulnerability data during restore without acting as package sources. If no audit sources are configured, NuGet Audit uses package sources and suppresses warning NU1905. [Learn more about audit sources](https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/nuget-config-file#auditsources)
trans-unit.target: Audit sources provide vulnerability data during restore without acting as package sources. If no audit sources are configured, NuGet Audit uses package sources and suppresses warning NU1905. [Learn more about audit sources](https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/nuget-config-file#auditsources)

trans-unit.source: Remove all audit sources to revert to using package sources for vulnerability data.
trans-unit.target: Remove all audit sources to revert to using package sources for vulnerability data.

trans-unit.note: Please leave the [ and ] brackets in place and do translate the words between them. Do not translate the URL inside ( ).

trans-unit.source: Configuration files are listed in order from highest to lowest priority.
trans-unit.target: Файлы конфигурации перечислены в порядке убывания приоритета (от самого высокого до самого низкого).

trans-unit.source: NuGet requires HTTPS sources. To use an HTTP source, you must explicitly set 'allowInsecureConnections' to true in your NuGet.Config file. Refer to [https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere](https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Для NuGet требуются источники HTTPS. Чтобы использовать источник HTTP, необходимо явно задать для параметра "allowInsecureConnections" значение true в файле NuGet.Config. Для получения более безопасных вариантов см. [https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere](https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere).

trans-unit.source: HTTP sources are insecure. Consider using HTTPS instead. 'AllowInsecureConnections' is enabled, permitting HTTP access. For more secure options, see [https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere](https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere).
trans-unit.target: Источники HTTP небезопасны. Рекомендуется использовать HTTPS вместо этого. Параметр AllowInsecureConnections включен и разрешает доступ по протоколу HTTP. Для получения более безопасных вариантов см. [https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere](https://aka.ms/nuget-https-everywhere).

trans-unit.source: Package sources define where NuGet retrieves packages for install, restore, audit, and update operations. [Learn more about package sources](https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/nuget-config-file#packagesources)
trans-unit.target: Package sources define where NuGet retrieves packages for install, restore, audit, and update operations. [Learn more about package sources](https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/nuget-config-file#packagesources)

trans-unit.note: "Contoso.Contracts" and "System.*" are examples of a package ID pattern and a package prefix pattern, respectively, so these two specific examples should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Automatically check for missing packages during build in Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Автоматически проверять отсутствие пакетов при сборке в Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Prompt for format selection on first package install
trans-unit.target: Запрос на выбор формата при первой установке пакета
